select * FROM PD_Plate_purchaseOrder where purchaseOrder_number LIKE "%"#{orderNumber}"%" AND purchaseCompany_name like "%"#{companyName}"%" AND receive_time between #{receiveTimeStart} and #{receiveTimeEnd} AND deliver_time between #{deliverTimeStart} and #{deliverTimeEnd};

UPDATE PD_Plate_purchaseOrder SET producer_name = #{producer_name} WHERE purchaseOrder_number = #{orderNumber};
UPDATE PD_Plate_purchaseOrder SET salesman_name = #{salesman_name} WHERE purchaseOrder_number = #{orderNumber};
UPDATE PD_Plate_purchaseOrder SET supervisor_name = #{supervisor_name} WHERE purchaseOrder_number = #{orderNumber};
mapper.select: select PD_Plate_purchaseOrder.* from PD_Plate_purchaseOrder inner join PD_Plate_productOrder on PD_Plate_purchaseOrder.purchaseOrder_number = PD_Plate_productOrder.fk_purchaseOrder_number inner join PD_Plate_productOrder_spec on PD_Plate_productOrder_spec.fk_productOrder_number = PD_Plate_productOrder.productOrder_number where PD_Plate_productOrder_spec.state_code = -1 GROUP BY PD_Plate_purchaseOrder.purchaseOrder_number

select PD_Plate_purchaseOrder.* from PD_Plate_purchaseOrder inner join PD_Plate_productOrder on PD_Plate_purchaseOrder.purchaseOrder_number = PD_Plate_productOrder.fk_purchaseOrder_number inner join PD_Plate_productOrder_spec on PD_Plate_productOrder_spec.fk_productOrder_number = PD_Plate_productOrder.productOrder_number where PD_Plate_productOrder_spec.state_code = 1 GROUP BY PD_Plate_purchaseOrder.purchaseOrder_number
